meanings.definition: A groove or furrow, especially one on the surface of the brain.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the sulci on the brain to understand its structure.
meanings.sent2: The doctor pointed out the sulci on the brain scan during the consultation.
meanings.sent3: The artist imagined tiny creatures living in the sulci of the brain, having a cozy home.
meanings.sent4: The sulci of the brain are like hidden valleys, each with its own secrets waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: As the surgeon navigated through the sulci, it felt like exploring a maze of knowledge.
